text: For Mariska Hargitay, playing Olivia Benson on Law & Order : SVU is more than just a job, it ’ s a calling. “ Every day I get on my knees and thank God for this opportunity. It ’ s not lost on me that God gave me this opportunity, this platform to speak about these issues. I really feel like it was a calling, it ’ s not an accident I came on this show, ” Hargitay told E! News at The Joyful Heart Foundation gala. “ I always wanted to be on service, but it ’ s hard. You say, ‘ What do I do?
